com.revature.jfbennatt.ers.daos

Interface EmployeeDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmployeeDaoPostgres

    public interface EmployeeDao
    DAO interface for interacting with the database.
    Author:
    Jared F Bennatt

    • Method Detail

      • deleteSessionToken

        boolean deleteSessionToken(java.lang.String token)
        Attempts to delete the plain text token from the database.
        Parameters:
        token - Session token of the user that will be deleted (the token, not the user).
        Returns:
        Whether or not the token was actually deleted

      • getEmployeeByEmail

        Employee getEmployeeByEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Gets an employee from their email. This is intended to be used to log in an employee and thus this method should set (at a minimum) the password, id, and first and last name of the Employee object being returned.
        Parameters:
        email - Email of the employee.
        Returns:
        An Employee object representing the employee or null if the employee doesn't exist.

      • getEmployeeByToken

        Employee getEmployeeByToken(java.lang.String token)
        Finds an employee based on their session token. This method should set every field in the returned Employee object except the password.
        Parameters:
        token - Session token of the employee (theoretically the employee would have already logged in and received a session token).
        Returns:
        Employee object representing the employee or null if the session token is invalid.

      • getTokenLength

        int getTokenLength()
        Returns the length (in chars) that this implementation uses for the session token.
        Returns:
        length (in chars) of the session token.

      • setTokenById

        boolean setTokenById(int empId,
                     java.lang.String token)
        Sets the token for this employee.
        Parameters:
        empId - Employee id of the employee to set the token for.
        token - Session token for this employee
        Returns:
        Whether or not this was successful.

      • datePattern

        java.lang.String datePattern()
        Returns the date pattern expected for the database (e.g. mm/dd/yyyy)
        Returns:
        String representation of the date pattern held in this database.

      • submitRequest

        boolean submitRequest(Reimbursement newReimb)
        Attempts to submit (add) a reimbursement to the database.
        Parameters:
        newReimb - Reimbursement object representing this request. At a minimum, the employee id, description, amount, date of expense (reimbDate), and the submit date must be present in this object.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the submission was successfully added to the database.

      • getStatus

        java.lang.String getStatus(Reimbursement reimb)
        Gets the status from the Reimbursement object (since the status is stored as an integer).
        Parameters:
        reimb - Reimbursement object to find the status of.
        Returns:
        String representation of the status of this reimbursement (e.g. pending, approved, or denied).

      • setPending

        void setPending(Reimbursement reimb)
        Sets the status of this reimbursement to pending.
        Parameters:
        reimb - Reimbursement object to set to pending.

      • setApproved

        void setApproved(Reimbursement reimb)
        Sets the status of this reimbursement to approved.
        Parameters:
        reimb - Reimbursement object to set to approved.

      • setDenied

        void setDenied(Reimbursement reimb)
        Sets the status of this reimbursement to denied.
        Parameters:
        reimb - Reimbursement object to set to denied.

      • getAllReimbursementsByEmployeeId

        java.util.List<Reimbursement> getAllReimbursementsByEmployeeId(int empId)
        Returns all of the reimbursements for this employee. If none exist, this will return an empty list.
        Parameters:
        empId - Id of employee to fetch reimbursements for.
        Returns:
        A List of Reimbursement objects (or null if there is an error). Note: having no records is not an error and, instead, an empty list will be returned.

      • changeProfile

        boolean changeProfile(Employee employee)
        Changes the profile of the employee (using the given employee id)
        Parameters:
        employee - Employee object to be updated (holding the updated values).

      • getPendingReimbursementsByEmployeeId

        java.util.List<Reimbursement> getPendingReimbursementsByEmployeeId(int empId)
        Gets all of the pending requests from this employee id.
        Parameters:
        empId - Employee id of the employee to fetch requests from.
        Returns:
        List of Reimbursement objects for this employee.

      • getProcessedReimbursementsByEmployeeId

        java.util.List<Reimbursement> getProcessedReimbursementsByEmployeeId(int empId)
        Gets all of the processed requests from this employee id.
        Parameters:
        empId - Employee id of the employee to fetch requests from.
        Returns:
        List of Reimbursement objects for this employee.

      • getAllEmployeesExceptManager

        java.util.List<Employee> getAllEmployeesExceptManager(int manId)
        Returns a list of all employees excluding the manager passed as an argument.
        Parameters:
        manId - Employee of the id of the manager (to be excluded from the list).
        Returns:
        List of Employee objects (or null if there is an error). An empty list is not an error.

      • getAllPendingRequestsExceptManager

        java.util.List<Reimbursement> getAllPendingRequestsExceptManager(int manId)
        Returns a list of all reimbursements that are pending and aren't from this manager.
        Parameters:
        manId - Employee id of the requesting manager
        Returns:
        List of Reimbursement objects or null if there is an error (an empty list is not an error).

      • approveRequest

        boolean approveRequest(int manId,
                       int reimbId,
                       java.util.Date date)
        Approves a reimbursement by the manager.
        Parameters:
        manId - Id of manager approving request.
        reimbId - Id of reimbursement being approved.
        date - Date of approval.
        Returns:
        Whether or not this was successful.

      • rejectRequest

        boolean rejectRequest(int manId,
                      int reimbId,
                      java.util.Date date)
        Rejects a reimbursement by the manager.
        Parameters:
        manId - Id of manager rejecting request.
        reimbId - Id of reimbursement being rejected.
        date - Date of rejection.
        Returns:
        Whether or not this was successful.

      • getAllProcessedRequests

        java.util.List<Reimbursement> getAllProcessedRequests()
        Returns all processed requests.
        Returns:
        List of Reimbursement objects or null if there's an error (an empty list is not an error).
